text: 6.11 Epe 2.2, Kol 3.7, Tat 3.3-7, Hib 10.22 Ned nɨbi ogɨnap anɨb ak tek gelɨgɨpɨm ak pen, tɨmel gɨpɨm gach ak God wik yokup. Yokɨlɨg gek, nɨbi binɨb suŋtep ne yɨbɨl mɨdebɨm. Bɨawl Jisas Klays ayɨp God chɨn Kawnan ne ak ayɨp kɨles kɨli ak dɨl nɨbop gek, God ayɨp jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl binɨb tep ne takaw ma mɨdeb okok mɨdebɨm.
